data.title: Getaway
data.text:
Getaway (26-Aug-2013)

Director: Courtney Solomon

Writers: Sean Finegan; Gregg Maxwell Parker

Keywords: Action/Adventure, Auto Racing

A retired race car driver must race against time in a custom car to save his kidnapped wife's life.

ABSTRACT

Brent Magna, a former race car driver, is informed by a mysterious and nameless man that his wife, Leanne, has been kidnapped and will be killed if he does not follow the man's orders. Aided by an anonymous young woman known only as "The Kid", Brent must jump behind the wheel of a Shelby Mustang Super Snake and engage in a pulse-pounding race against time if he is to save his spouse's life.
